Key Match Events: Jaren Jackson Jr. scored 38 points, Desmond Bane added 31 points for the Grizzlies
Kevin Durant bundled 29 points, 10 rebounds and six assists to lead the Suns
Bradley Beal was injured in the first quarter and ruled out for the rest of the contest
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies opened up a 14-point halftime advantage and held on after Phoenix closed within a point in the fourth quarter
Others: Luke Kennard supplied 17 points and seven rebounds off the bench for Memphis
John Konchar pulled down 12 rebounds to go with his seven points
Tyus Jones contributed 21 points for Phoenix to complement 12 apiece from Mason Plumlee and Monte Morris
Devin Booker managed 16 points on just 4-of-20 shooting after missing the Sunsâ€™ last five games with a groin strain
